keyMoments.title: Scotch's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Scotch appears on a winter island in the New World as a guardian of one of Kaido's favorite islands where weapons are manufactured. He confronts X Drake and warns him about the island's protection.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of one of Kaido's subordinates, foreshadowing the Yonko's influence and operations in the New World.
keyMoments.quote: This island is a favorite of Kaido's and is under his protection.

abilities.description: Scotch has a triple-barrel gun integrated into his right hand as part of his cyborg modifications.

relationships.description: Scotch serves Kaido as a guardian of one of his favorite islands in the New World.

evolutionMoments.description: Scotch is revealed to be guarding a weapon manufacturing island for Kaido.

reveals.information: Works as a subordinate and guardian for the Yonko Kaido
Is a cyborg with mechanical body parts including a triple-barrel gun arm

name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law Prepares for the New World
keyMoments.description: Trafalgar Law and the Heart Pirates are shown near Sabaody Archipelago, discussing their plans to enter the New World after the events at Marineford.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Law's continued journey and foreshadows his importance in the New World storylines.

keyMoments.title: Drake Encounters Scotch
keyMoments.description: X Drake arrives at a winter island controlled by Kaido and encounters the cyborg guardian Scotch.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Drake's presence in the New World and his interest in Kaido's operations.

keyMoments.title: Drake Deliberately Provokes Kaido
keyMoments.description: Drake asks Scotch if attacking him would gain Kaido's attention, then transforms into his dinosaur form to fight, intentionally trying to get noticed by the Yonko.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Drake's strategic plan to infiltrate Kaido's organization, part of his undercover Marine mission.
keyMoments.quote: If I attack you, will that get Kaido's attention?

reveals.information: Deliberately seeking to gain Kaido's attention by attacking his subordinates

name.japanese: スクラッチメン・アプー

keyMoments.title: Apoo Battles Giant Boars
keyMoments.description: Scratchmen Apoo and his crew encounter and battle enormous wild boars on a New World island.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the unusual dangers and creatures present in the New World.

keyMoments.title: Running on Invisible Air Paths
keyMoments.description: While fleeing from giant boars, Apoo and his crew discover they can run on invisible pathways in the air, a mysterious phenomenon of the island.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the bizarre and unpredictable nature of New World islands.

keyMoments.title: Bonney Defeated by Blackbeard
keyMoments.description: Jewelry Bonney and her crew have been defeated by the Blackbeard Pirates. Blackbeard mocks her and offers her the chance to join as his woman, which she refuses.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the power gap between Supernovas and Yonko-level pirates.

keyMoments.title: Bonney's World Government Connection Revealed
keyMoments.description: When captured by Akainu, the Admiral reveals that he was frightened when Bonney escaped from the World Government and is glad she's back under their control.
keyMoments.significance: Major mystery reveal about Bonney's special relationship with the World Government that won't be fully explained for years.

statusHistory.reason: Defeated by Blackbeard Pirates and subsequently captured by Admiral Akainu

relationships.description: Bonney has a mysterious and important connection to the World Government that makes even Admiral Akainu wary of her escape.

evolutionMoments.description: Akainu reveals he was frightened when Bonney escaped from the World Government.

reveals.information: Has a mysterious connection to the World Government that makes her escape a serious concern for the Marines
Defeated by Blackbeard Pirates and captured by Marines

name.japanese: マーシャル・D・ティーチ

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Defeats Bonney
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard and his crew have defeated Jewelry Bonney's crew and are planning to exchange her with the Marines since they don't have a ship.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Blackbeard's growing power after acquiring Whitebeard's Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.quote: You're too weak to survive. You're the first to be eliminated.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Flees from Akainu
keyMoments.description: When Admiral Akainu arrives, the Blackbeard Pirates immediately decide to flee rather than risk confrontation.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even with two Devil Fruits, Blackbeard is not yet ready to face Marine Admirals.

reveals.information: Despite having two Devil Fruits, Blackbeard still avoids direct confrontation with Admiral Akainu

keyMoments.title: Akainu Pursues Pirates
keyMoments.description: Admiral Akainu arrives commanding a Marine battleship, causing the Blackbeard Pirates to immediately flee.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Akainu's authority and power in the post-war period.

keyMoments.title: Akainu's Warning to Bonney
keyMoments.description: Akainu reveals to the captured Bonney that he was frightened when she escaped from the World Government.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals important information about Bonney's mysterious connection to the World Government.
keyMoments.quote: I was truly frightened when you escaped from the World Government, but I'm glad you're back under our control.

reveals.information: Has knowledge of Jewelry Bonney's connection to the World Government and was concerned about her escape

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper's Failed Disguise
keyMoments.description: Chopper returns to Birdie Kingdom and attempts to disguise himself as 'Chopper Mask' but is instantly recognized.
keyMoments.significance: Comedic moment showing Chopper's personality and his relationship with the island's inhabitants.

keyMoments.title: Chopper Commits to Medical Training
keyMoments.description: Chopper decides to stay on Birdie Kingdom to study medicinal plants and improve his strength to better serve Luffy and the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Character development showing Chopper's determination to grow stronger during the timeskip.

reveals.information: Determined to improve both medical knowledge and combat strength to better support Luffy
